name: Space Chip (itch) (Supremacy252)
description:
Space Chip is a 2D Top Down Shooter Game developed with Unity. You play as a Chipmunk and use a nut blaster and power ups to fight against waves of evil animals to reach the end of the level.

This game was developed in context of a semester project at Games Academy in Berlin/Germany. Four students on the first semster worked about 8 weeks on this project.

Enjoy it and prepare your nuts to save the galaxy!

Input: Keyboard and Mouse
